auraeNavy.description: Soft Ink. Primary text and headings in light mode. Remapped in 2026 rebrand.

auraeSlate.description: Slate. Secondary headings and dark surfaces. Derived mid-point between Deep Slate and Soft Ink.

auraeTeal.description: Aurae Teal. Brand accent, CTA buttons, active states, primary chart lines. Core logo colour.

auraeSoftTeal.description: Muted Mint. Premium highlights, tinted backgrounds, tag fills, active status badge background.

auraeLavender.description: Pale Lavender. Secondary surfaces, selected states, subtle dividers. Derived from Soft Lavender at near-white tint.

auraeMidGray.description: Mid Tone. Secondary text, labels, metadata, unselected pill labels. Updated to #6D717F for WCAG AA compliance (4.54:1 against Cloud White).

auraeBackground.description: Cloud White. Primary app background in light mode.

auraeBlush.description: Pale Blush. Severity 5 (very severe) surface. Warm rose that signals severity without aggression.

auraeSage.description: Mint Sage. Severity 1 (mild) surface. Slightly greener mint for a calm, positive read.

auraeIndigo.description: Deeper Soft Lavender. Health/HRV data, calm/neutral chart accent, premium icons needing contrast.

auraeAmber.description: Warm Amber. Weather/environmental data, medication effectiveness, warm-risk chart accent.

auraeDarkSage.description: Dark Teal. Selected states, chart lines, positive lifestyle data. Derived from Aurae Teal at increased depth.

auraeDeepSlate.description: Deep Slate. Dark mode primary background and surface. Wordmark colour in the new brand identity.

auraeStarlight.description: Starlight. Dark mode primary text colour.

auraeSoftInk.description: Soft Ink. Explicit alias for light-mode primary text. Identical value to auraeNavy; use when semantic intent is body text rather than heading.

auraeSoftLavender.description: Soft Lavender. Full-saturation lavender for premium UI, AI highlights, and onboarding icon accents.

white.description: Pure white. Reserved for page/card backgrounds in light mode only. Do NOT use as button label or pill label — use auraeSeverityLabelSelected instead.

auraeTealAccessible.description: Text-safe teal. Use wherever auraeTeal appears as text or icon colour on light backgrounds. Contrast: 4.55:1 against Cloud White (#F6F7FA). WCAG AA compliant.

auraeLavenderAccessible.description: Text-safe lavender. Use wherever Soft Lavender appears as text on light backgrounds. Contrast: 5.1:1 against Cloud White. WCAG AA compliant.

auraeSeverityLabelSelected.description: Dark label for selected severity pills and primary CTA button. Near-black dark green readable on all severity accent fills and on Aurae Teal (#8AC4C1). Contrast: ≥ 10:1 on teal fill, WCAG AAA.

auraeCardDark.description: Dark mode elevated card surface. Sits above auraeDeepSlate (#1A1D24) background.

auraeSecondaryBackgroundDark.description: Dark mode secondary background layer. Between Deep Slate and Card Dark in the elevation hierarchy.

level1.description: Severity 1 (Mild) background surface. Mint sage — calm, positive.

level5.description: Severity 5 (Very Severe) background surface. Pale blush.
Severity 5 (Very Severe) foreground accent. Muted rose-red.

primaryText.description: Primary text and headings in light mode.

invertedText.description: Text on filled/tinted surfaces such as the primary CTA button or selected severity pills. Dark ink (#1C2826) — not white — to ensure WCAG AA on lighter accent fills.

backgroundPrimary.description: Main app background in light mode.

backgroundDark.description: Main app background in dark mode.

backgroundElevated.description: Card and sheet surfaces elevated above the background in light mode.

interactivePrimary.description: Primary interactive brand colour. CTA fills, borders, active accents.

interactivePremium.description: Premium and AI feature accent. Locked-state icons and upgrade prompts.

interactiveDestructive.description: Destructive action colour. Muted rose-red matching severity 5 accent.

interactiveDisabled.description: Disabled state colour. Applied at 50% opacity over the component surface.

dataPositive.description: Positive/low-risk data accent. Charts, severity 1-2 states.

dataNeutral.description: Neutral/calm data accent. HRV and health metric charts.

dataWarning.description: Warning/moderate-risk data accent. Weather and environmental charts.

dataNegative.description: High-risk/negative data accent. Severity 5, destructive states.

primary.description: Primary brand gradient. Aurae Teal → Soft Lavender at 45°. Use ONLY on: paywall hero section, premium badge, logomark renders, upgrade CTA button fill. Never on body text or data charts.

subtle.description: Subtle teal wash. Aurae Teal → Muted Mint at 180°. Use for premium feature tint surfaces and insight card highlights.

display.description: Fraunces Bold. Used for display and H1 headings.

heading.description: Fraunces Regular. Used for H2 sub-section headings.

body.description: Plus Jakarta Sans Regular. Used for body copy and captions.

label.description: Plus Jakarta Sans SemiBold. Used for labels, buttons (secondary/destructive), tab bar.

buttonPrimary.description: Primary button label size in points. Fraunces Bold.

buttonSecondary.description: Secondary and destructive button label size in points. Jakarta SemiBold.

bold.description: Bold weight. Used with Fraunces for display and H1.

semiBold.description: SemiBold weight. Used with Plus Jakarta Sans for labels and secondary buttons.

regular.description: Regular weight. Used for body copy, captions, and H2.

display.description: Line height for auraeDisplay (48pt size). Approximately 1.17x.

h1.description: Line height for auraeH1 (32pt size). Approximately 1.25x.

h2.description: Line height for auraeH2 (22pt size). Approximately 1.27x.

body.description: Line height for auraeBody (16pt size). 1.5x for comfortable reading.

label.description: Line height for auraeLabel (13pt size). Approximately 1.38x.

caption.description: Line height for auraeCaption (12pt size). Approximately 1.33x.

auraeDisplay.description: 48pt Fraunces Bold. Home screen hero numbers and app name. Scales relative to largeTitle Dynamic Type style.

auraeH1.description: 32pt Fraunces Bold. Top-level section headings. Scales relative to title Dynamic Type style.

auraeH2.description: 22pt Fraunces Regular. Sub-section headings and card titles. Scales relative to title2 Dynamic Type style.

auraeBody.description: 16pt Plus Jakarta Sans Regular. Primary reading copy and form fields. Scales relative to body Dynamic Type style.

auraeLabel.description: 13pt Plus Jakarta Sans SemiBold. Interactive labels, tab bar, severity pill text. Scales relative to caption Dynamic Type style.

auraeCaption.description: 12pt Plus Jakarta Sans Regular. Timestamps, metadata, fine print. Scales relative to caption2 Dynamic Type style.

screenPadding.description: Horizontal padding applied to full-screen edges.

sectionSpacing.description: Vertical space between top-level page sections.

itemSpacing.description: Vertical space between items within a section or card.

cardPadding.description: Standard inner padding for card surfaces.

pillSpacingHorizontalDefault.description: Horizontal padding inside a severity pill in default (non-compact) mode.

pillSpacingHorizontalCompact.description: Horizontal padding inside a severity pill in compact mode.

pillRowSpacing.description: Gap between adjacent severity pills in the selector row.

statusBadgePaddingHorizontal.description: Horizontal padding inside a LogCard status badge.

statusBadgePaddingVertical.description: Vertical padding inside a LogCard status badge.

contextChipSpacing.description: Gap between icon and label inside a LogCard context chip.

contextRowSpacing.description: Gap between adjacent context chips in the LogCard context row.

buttonHeight.description: Fixed height of the primary CTA button (AuraeButton).

minTapTarget.description: Minimum accessible tap target per Apple HIG and WCAG 2.1 AA.

severityPillHeight.description: Height of each severity pill button. Meets minimum tap target.

severityBarWidth.description: Width of the severity indicator bar on the left edge of a LogCard.

cardRadius.description: Standard corner radius for card and surface containers.

buttonRadius.description: Corner radius for the primary CTA button (AuraeButton).

severityPillRadius.description: Corner radius for severity pill buttons in SeveritySelector.

severityBarRadius.description: Corner radius for the severity indicator bar on the left edge of a LogCard.

statusBadgeRadius.description: Full capsule radius for LogCard status badge (Ongoing / duration).

color.description: Shadow base colour for card surfaces. Matches auraeNavy (Soft Ink). Applied at cardShadowOpacity (7%).

opacity.description: Opacity of the card drop shadow.

radius.description: Blur radius of the card drop shadow.

x.description: Horizontal offset of the card drop shadow.

y.description: Vertical offset of the card drop shadow.

opacity.description: Opacity of the selected severity pill shadow. Applied to the pill's severity accent color.

radius.description: Blur radius of the selected severity pill shadow.

x.description: Horizontal offset of the selected severity pill shadow.

y.description: Vertical offset of the selected severity pill shadow.

height.description: Fixed height of the primary button.

borderRadius.description: Corner radius of the primary button.

backgroundColor.description: Fill color for the primary button.

labelColor.description: Text color for the primary button label. Dark ink on teal fill — ≥10:1 contrast, WCAG AAA. Do not use white (#FFFFFF), which fails WCAG AA on auraeTeal.

borderColor.description: Border color for the primary button. Transparent (no visible border).

borderWidth.description: Border width for the primary button.

fontFamily.description: Fraunces Bold. Primary CTA uses display typeface for brand weight.

fontSize.description: 18pt font size for the primary button label.

fontWeight.description: Bold weight for the primary button label.

pressedScale.description: Scale factor applied during the press animation. Set to 1.0 when Reduce Motion is enabled.

disabledOpacity.description: Opacity applied to the button when in the disabled state.

height.description: Fixed height of the secondary button.

borderRadius.description: Corner radius of the secondary button.

backgroundColor.description: Fill color for the secondary button. Transparent (outline style).

labelColor.description: Text color for the secondary button label. Uses text-safe teal (4.55:1 on Cloud White). Do not use auraeTeal (#8AC4C1) directly as text.

borderColor.description: Border color for the secondary button outline. Matches label for visual consistency.

borderWidth.description: Stroke width for the secondary button border.

fontFamily.description: Plus Jakarta Sans SemiBold. Secondary uses UI typeface to read as a supporting action.

fontSize.description: 16pt font size for the secondary button label.

fontWeight.description: SemiBold weight for the secondary button label.

disabledOpacity.description: Opacity applied to the button when in the disabled state.

height.description: Fixed height of the destructive button.

borderRadius.description: Corner radius of the destructive button.

backgroundColor.description: Fill color for the destructive button. Transparent (outline style).

labelColor.description: Text color for the destructive button label. Muted rose-red.

borderColor.description: Border color for the destructive button outline. Muted rose-red.

borderWidth.description: Stroke width for the destructive button border.

fontFamily.description: Plus Jakarta Sans SemiBold. Destructive uses UI typeface.

fontSize.description: 16pt font size for the destructive button label.

fontWeight.description: SemiBold weight for the destructive button label.

disabledOpacity.description: Opacity applied to the button when in the disabled state.

height.description: Fixed height of each severity pill. Meets 44pt minimum tap target.

borderWidth.description: Border stroke width for severity pills in all states.

horizontalPaddingDefault.description: Horizontal padding inside a pill in default (full-label) mode.

horizontalPaddingCompact.description: Horizontal padding inside a pill in compact (numeric) mode.

rowSpacing.description: Gap between adjacent pills in the selector row.

minimumScaleFactor.description: Minimum scale factor for pill label text before truncation.

borderColor.description: Border at 20% opacity of the level accent color.
Border at 20% opacity of the level accent color.
Border at 20% opacity of the level accent color.
Border at 20% opacity of the level accent color.
Border at 20% opacity of the level accent color.

labelColor.description: Dark ink on accent fill. White (#FFF) fails WCAG AA on lighter levels 1–2.
Dark ink on accent fill. White (#FFF) fails WCAG AA on lighter levels 1–2.

backgroundColor.description: Card background. SwiftUI systemBackground adaptive color. White in light mode.

borderRadius.description: Corner radius of the LogCard container.

innerPadding.description: Padding inside the LogCard container on all sides.

contentSpacing.description: Vertical spacing between rows within the LogCard content column.

horizontalStackSpacing.description: Spacing between the severity bar and the content column (12pt).

width.description: Width of the left-edge severity indicator bar.

borderRadius.description: Corner radius of the severity indicator bar.

activeBackgroundColor.description: Background of the status badge when the headache is ongoing.

activeLabelColor.description: Text color of the status badge when the headache is ongoing.

inactiveBackgroundColor.description: Background of the status badge when the headache is resolved.

inactiveLabelColor.description: Text color of the status badge when the headache is resolved.

shadow.description: Drop shadow applied to the LogCard surface.
